title: 1852. Copyright Infringement -- Penalties -- 17 U.S.C. 506(a) And 18 U.S.C 2319

last_post.content:
Q: Why haven't I seen this #ChatGPT hot take? 💥

Anyone trying to pass off ChatGPT-generated text as their own immediately loses copyright to said text & is subject to penalties under 18 U.S.C. § 2319¹ because the terms assign ownership to the user predicated on adherence to same. I.e., "You may not... represent that output from the Services was human-generated when it is not."²

A: No one reads the terms.

---------

¹ https://www.justice.gov/archives/jm/criminal-resource-manual-1852-copyright-infringement-penalties-17-usc-506a-and-18-usc-2319

title: Is life in the UK really as bad as the numbers suggest? Yes, it is

last_post.content:
If the forecasts are bad, it is the scene in the rear-view mirror that is truly horrifying. The British economy is in a generation-long slough of despond, a slow-burning economic catastrophe. Real household disposable income per capita has barely increased for 15 years.

This is not normal. Since 1948, this measure of spending power reliably increased in the UK, doubling every 30 years...
https://www.ft.com/content/ef830f78-75ee-4b91-a48e-04defa0f96d4

Ode to the Greeks. An ancient Greek with a lyre harp and a beautiful Greek tunic sings to the stars his ode to the forgotten Greek warriors. His tunic is adorned with black birds flying in a bright sky. Handmade collage using paper and watercolor.

Link to Collage: https://ernesto-beckford.pixels.com/featured/ode-to-the-greeks-ernesto-beckford.html

title: Gender inequality and self-publication are common among academic editors - Nature Human Behaviour

last_post.content:
"although women are already underrepresented among scientists (26% of all unique scientists in MAG), they are even more underrepresented among editors and editors-in-chief (14% and 8%, respectively). Moreover, the gap remained stable over the past five decades; the proportion of female editors has consistently remained around half that of female scientists, although gender parity has been steadily increasing in science in general" #academia #sexism #science

title: Kubera – The World's Most Modern Wealth Tracker

last_post.content:
I've really been enjoying https://www.kubera.com/ as a replacement for Personal Capital the past few weeks.

I particularly like how I can separate out accounts into 'Sheets' — so my IRAs/etc don't get mixed up in my Robinhood silly money. Oh, and shout out to having a keyboard command for screenshots!

If you're looking for something targeted at investments and not transactions, definitely give it a go.

Here's the Declaration of Daniel Friedberg in the FTX bankruptcy case.

It has a lot of wild stuff in it.

But keep in mind when reading it that he was one of the attorneys involved in the Ultimate Bet Scandal years ago.

Stated differently, everything about this case is sketchy and everyone is likely trying to save their own skin so I wouldn't trust anything that *anybody* says, whether under oath or otherwise.

FEM (Frequently expressed (mis)conceptions)

#1: “So you are on #Mastodon? “ (Nope, noooo, I am not, I am on #Fediverse, please do not confuse Mastodon with #Fediverse)

#2 “Mastodon is so confusing because there …” (As a matter of fact, Twitter and Facebook are far more confusing to use. If all you want to do are open an account, access the web page, post, repost, follow people,and like, what exactly is confusing in Mastodon that is not confusing in twitter?)

#3 “Meh! After all these they still haven’t figured out that edit button”

(Really? Which server you are on? Have you tried qoto.org? If editing your post is super important, try #Pleroma, #Rebased, #Misskey … )

#4 “But with only 500 characters you can only do so much …”

(Well, if you want to write the Ben Hur or War and Peace in your posts, there are servers that allow you 65,000+ characters to play with and there are several instances where you get 1000+ characters to play with… )

#5 “Hmmmm interesting, there are no groups on this thing, where are the groups?”

(Did you check out a.gup.pe?)

#6 “But but where are the people? It’s so empty”

(Have you realised you are starting out new in a new neighbourhood? Can you not find people and topics to start with. We are not even into getting how you can follow your Tweeps who are here, or, (don’t recommend but), if you are desperate, cross post from the birdsite to here, will sure find some friends )

#6 “Hundreds of servers, no central control! What happens if my admin closes shop? Are we not stranded? What happens to my data?”

(If scale is your worry, rest assured you are not stuck with your server, you have options here. Set up accounts everywhere post, like, share, reshare to your heart’s content. Better yet, set up your own server to traverse the #Fediverse. This thing is alive, thriving and growing. Welcome to the magical world of #Fediveese, a real,safe fun place!)

#Fediverse
